sentences: Korjas tee pealt nonne ja kandis oma aiamaale.
Isa on mõnel korral maast nonni kahmanud ja pakkunud.
Hobuse väljaheidete kerajas pabul on nonn.
context: The word 'nonii' is an Estonian noun referring to the round balls of horse droppings or manure. It's a colloquial term often used when describing cleaning up after horses or dealing with their waste in agricultural contexts.
